Text: Do you know if this is Mandarin or Cantonese? I'll grab it and let peple know if you don't reply before then.
Bleh, I should have guessed from the name Fung Yuet Mow, it's Cantonese, GuanDong Hua.
Ah, yes, forgot to specify any of that, as I am only interested in the written language, not any of the spoken ones.
Still grabbing it anyway, useful for the written as you say, thanks for the share. :)
